decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan (unnumbered, no date). Received on 07 June 2016.
2172/001 Rev. C, 2172/002 Rev. C, 2172/003 Rev. C, 2172/004 Rev. C, 2172/005 Rev. C. Received on 17 August 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The window formed in the side roof elevation shall be obscure glazed and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a side and rear roof extension incorporating one front roof window to the house
